function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Proactive signals are costly, leading some firms to choose not to adopt an accommodative posture.","Impact":"Inefficient response to pandemics and contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Encouraging the adoption of accommodative signals despite the cost.","Technologies":"Communication technologies for efficient and cost-effective signaling.","People":"Firms, service organizations.","Owner":"Management, leadership teams."},{"Description":"Inertial pressures to conform to laws, regulations, and decrees imposed by local and state governments.","Impact":"Inflexible response to pandemic-related requirements.","Mitigation":"Adopting tinkering and theorizing strategies to engender innovation and differentiation while adhering to institutional demands.","Technologies":"Innovation and communication technologies.","People":"Service organizations, firms.","Owner":"Management, leadership teams."},{"Description":"Deliberate communication strategies using accommodative signals are necessary, even if costly.","Impact":"Inefficient communication during pandemics and contagious diseases.","Mitigation":"Promoting the use of accommodative signals despite the cost.","Technologies":"Communication technologies for efficient and cost-effective signaling.","People":"Firms, service organizations.","Owner":"Management, leadership teams."}]}
